data.name: Devilian: Champion Pack
data.detailed_description:
Devilians grow in strength with every alliance they’ve forged, and every demon they’ve slain.
Enhance your abilities with the Champion Pack’s rare Talismans, and draw upon the power of legendary heroes of Nala to devastate any forces that dare oppose you.

30-Day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

Sacrificial Talisman Box (x5)

Grants a Rare, Heroic, or Legendary Sacrificial Talisman when opened

Ael’s Tear Supply Box (x5)

Drops a random number of Ael’s Tears when opened

Gemmed Talisman Box (x4)

Grants a Rare, Heroic, or Legendary Talisman when opened

Megaphone (x50)

Broadcasts a message to the whole world

data.short_description: Enhance your abilities with the Champion Pack’s rare Talismans, and draw upon the power of legendary heroes of Nala to devastate any forces that dare oppose you.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
